Section.about_paragraph_1: As a front-end developer, I design interfaces that are both attractive and high-performing.
Section.about_paragraph_2: I enjoy transforming complex ideas into fluid experiences through a creative approach.
Section.about_paragraph_3: What motivates me is bringing projects with a tangible impact to life. Combining technical rigor with a sense of design.

adeupa.subtitle: Proof of Concept • PWA
adeupa.description: Developed to help local businesses from Paris to get more visibility.

negatifplus.subtitle: E-commerce Website
negatifplus.description: An e-commerce website specializing in photography equipment and accessories.

adeupa.title: Adeupa
adeupa.subtitle: Proof of Concept • PWA
adeupa.about_paragraph_1: This project was created as part of a end-of-year assignment. We were tasked with developing a proof of concept for JCEP, an association committed to supporting local shops and businesses.
adeupa.about_paragraph_2: To tackle the visibility challenges these shops face in Paris, my team and I designed a Progressive Web App (PWA) focused on improving their online presence and accessibility.
adeupa.about_paragraph_3: It was an ambitious project with a clear goal — to convince our clients to present our solution to the Paris City Council and secure the resources needed to bring it to life.

negatifplus.title: Négatif+
negatifplus.subtitle: E-commerce Website
negatifplus.about_paragraph_1: Négatif+ is an e-commerce website dedicated to photography equipment, accessories and services for both enthusiasts and professionals.
